articles.title: NINE INCH NAILS: New Video Interview With TRENT REZNOR Posted Online
articles.description: Alessandro Cortini, keyboard player for NINE INCH NAILS, announced least week that he is leaving the band to concentrate on his own projects. NINE INCH NAILS has tapped LOSTPROPHETS' Ilan Rubin to handle the drum duties for the group on the road beginning in early 2009. Josh Freese, who made his final appearance with NINE INCH NAILS in Las Vegas on December 13, played with the band for the last three years, joining the lineup in late 2005.
articles.author: BLABBERMOUTH.NET Latest News

articles.title: Seether’s Finding Beauty In Negative Spaces Doesn’t Get Enough Credit
articles.description: Seether : Finding Beauty In Negative Spaces is an album that I bought earlier this year when I took over The Rock Dose. Amongst all the Schlock or Cock rock, whatever you want to call most of it these days, Seether is a bit different in my opinion. Tags : Finding Beauty In Negative Space, seether, Shaun MorganShare This
articles.author: Scott

articles.title: The 'Gum Drop LXVIII: Hear New Appleseed Cast, Win A Crosley Turntable
articles.description: In February, longtime California to Kansas post rockers the Appleseed Cast will release their sixth studio album Sagarmatha, the first since 2006's Peregrine. Sagarmatha is out 2/17 via The Militia Group. This week we also offered the chance to win a Crosley CR40 Mini Turntable.
articles.author: Stereogum

articles.title: Chris Martin on Coldplay Breakup
articles.description: We have split up on this tour, he confessed to the Daily Mirror. So what qualifies as bad news in the Coldplay household?  Well, putting things into perspective, there hasn't been anything that bad for a while, Martin said.
articles.author: Matt Kiser

articles.title: No Doubt: Tour But No Album in 2009
articles.description: Sorry, No Doubt fans, you're going to have to wait for new music. [ We'll have ] a mobile studio on the bus and eventually get to a new No Doubt record. I can play reggae music to my grave.
articles.author: Matt Kiser

articles.title: Keane and Kanye Collaborate
articles.description: So it makes sense that it was the place where mutual musical appreciators Keane and Kanye West first made sweet music together. Earlier this year, Keane and Kanye shared an amazing night in the studio in Paris where they gushed about each other's work. So much, in fact, that Keane's infatuation with West hasn't dissipated.
articles.author: Matt Kiser

articles.title: Exclusive: Fall Out Boy's Impromptu NYC Gig
articles.description: Fall Out Boy fought the law in New York's Washington Square Park on Monday afternoon, and the law won, mostly. Watch our exclusive video, provided by Fall Out Boy themselves, and see the guys confronting the police. Oh, and at the 6:00 mark, Pete shows off Blackberry pix of his newborn son.
articles.author: Matt Kiser

articles.title: Franz Ferdinand - Tonight: Franz Ferdinand
articles.description: Naming themselves after the archduke whose assassination sparked the First World War, the band mix grandeur and pretension with a shrewd pop touch. Sitting idle since 2005, ‘ Tonight : Franz Ferdinand ’ is an album long delayed. Refining and transcending their familiar pop formula, ‘ Tonight : Franz Ferdinand ’ is the band’s most complete work to date.
articles.author: Robin Murray

articles.title: Tragic O'Hara - Above The Below
articles.description: ' Above The Below' is simplicity ; Of course you do. Tracklisting : 1 Caught Between The Devil2. Give Me A ReasonProduced by : Steven McIntyre
articles.author: mark191082

articles.title: Courteeners try different approach on new album
articles.description: Morrissey's favourite band, The Courteeners, have plans afoot for their next album. Number two will be completely different to album number one. Jude album, which peaked in the UK album charts at # 4
articles.author: Twisted Ear News
